verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump ’s companies] [V: sold] [ARG1: more than $ 35 million in real estate] [ARGM-TMP: in 2017] , [ARGM-ADV: mostly to secretive shell companies] , a USA TODAY review found .
President Trump ’s companies sold more than $ 35 million in real estate in 2017 , mostly to secretive shell companies , [ARG0: a USA TODAY review] [V: found] .
